title: Seigi no Mikata wa Saigo ni Warau
original_name: 正義の味方は最後に微笑う
sinopse:
Ever since they met at a TV recording in a playground, Senbonmatsu has always looked up to the character Dr. Red. When he finally gets his break in the same drama, he gets to know the actual person behind Dr. Red's mask. But is Dr. Red really the hero that Senbonmatsu thinks he is...?

(Source: MU)
